name: Santa Cookie Gulp - Santa's Christmas Eve Cookies & Milk Adventure!
name_original: Santa Cookie Gulp - Santa's Christmas Eve Cookies & Milk Adventure!
description:
Santa's Hungry and needs to deliver all his presents!
Help him gulp the cookies and milk!
Dodge the burnt cookies.
Be careful....it gets harder the longer you play.
Gulp your way to a new high score

Cookies = 1 point
Milk = 3 points
Burnt Cookies = Game Over
